He is a pioneer in promoting Medical Tourism in the region and has received advanced surgical training in over 10 countries.

items.title: Robotic & Advanced Hip, Knee and Shoulder Joint Replacement
items.desc: Minimally invasive Hip, Knee & Shoulder replacement using Robotic Navigation & High-Performance Implants.
items.intro: Joint pain shouldn't limit your life. As the pioneer of Navigation Surgery in Central India, Dr. Jinsiwale combines 'Robotic Precision' with 'Minimally Invasive' protocols. Whether it is a Knee, Hip, or Shoulder replacement, we utilize Computer Assisted Surgery (CAS) to map your unique anatomy with sub-millimeter accuracy, ensuring a faster return to daily activities.

technology.title: The Technology Advantage: CAS & Materials
technology.content:
We combine two critical innovations: 
1. **Computer Assisted Surgery (CAS):** Like a GPS for your joint, this infrared system builds a real-time 3D model of your bone structure, allowing for perfect implant alignment impossible with the naked eye.
2. **High-Performance Implants:** We strictly use international-standard materials like 'Ceramic-on-Ceramic' for hips and 'High-Flex' designs for knees to ensure longevity.
technology.imageCaption: Advanced Navigation System & Ceramic Implant Demo

process.title: Robotic Knee
process.desc: Sub-millimeter precision mapping for perfect alignment and a 'forgotten knee' feeling.

process.title: Muscle-Sparing Hip
process.desc: Minimally invasive techniques for Avascular Necrosis (AVN) that promote rapid walking.

process.title: Complex Shoulder
process.desc: Specialized 'Reverse Polarity' implants for severe rotator cuff damage and arthritis.

items.doctorExpertise: Precision defines the lifespan of your implant. Even a millimeter of error can affect how natural it feels. With over 10,000+ joint surgeries (including 6,000+ Hip & 4,000+ Knee replacements), I brought Robotic Navigation to Central India to ensure that every patient gets a result that feels natural. My goal is to intervene at the right time with the best technology to preserve your independence.

items.title: Traumatology
items.desc: Customized surgical planning using 'I Assist' smart tools.
items.intro: No two knees are alike. 'Patient Specific Technology' moves away from the 'one size fits all' approach. We use the 'I Assist' smart tool—a palm-sized electronic navigation device—to deliver a personalized surgical experience.

technology.title: How 'I Assist' Works
technology.content: The 'I Assist' system is a micro-navigation tool that attaches directly to the surgical site. It contains accelerometers and sensors (similar to a smartphone) that transmit precise alignment data to Dr. Jinsiwale in real-time, eliminating the need for bulky consoles while maintaining robotic-level accuracy.

process.title: Step 1: Personalized Guide
process.desc: We use MRI/CT scans to create a 3D mold of your knee.

process.title: Step 2: Electronic Validation
process.desc: The I-Assist tool validates the bone cuts instantly.

process.title: Step 3: Customized Fit
process.desc: The implant is placed to restore your natural mechanical axis.

items.doctorExpertise: Every patient's anatomy is unique, so why should your surgery be generic? Customization is the key to a perfect fit. By using patient-specific technology, we respect your unique bone structure. This personalized approach minimizes wear and maximizes comfort, backed by my expertise in cutting-edge instrumentation.

items.title: Arthroscopy & Sports Medicine
items.intro: Sports injuries like ACL tears or Meniscus damage no longer mean the end of an active lifestyle. Arthroscopy is a 'Keyhole' procedure where a tiny camera is inserted into the joint, allowing Dr. Jinsiwale to repair damage without opening the knee.

technology.title: HD Visualization System
technology.content: We utilize high-definition arthroscopic cameras that magnify the internal structures of the joint by 20x. This allows for precise trimming of torn meniscus and accurate placement of ligament grafts.

process.title: Step 1: Diagnosis
process.desc: The camera confirms the extent of the ligament tear.

process.title: Step 2: Graft Harvesting
process.desc: A strong tendon is harvested (usually from the hamstring) to create the new ligament.

process.title: Step 3: Reconstruction
process.desc: The new ligament is fixed securely using bio-absorbable screws.

items.doctorExpertise: For an athlete or an active individual, a ligament tear can feel like the end of the road. It doesn't have to be. Arthroscopy allows us to repair the damage without cutting open the joint, preserving your natural anatomy. My goal is to get you back on the field—stronger and more confident than before. We have helped over 12,000 patients return to their active lives.

items.title: Spine Surgery
items.desc: Comprehensive management of lumbar spine disorders.
items.intro: Spine surgery is often feared, but with modern microsurgical techniques, the outcomes are excellent. We focus on 'Decompression' and 'Stabilization'—relieving pressure on the nerves while ensuring the spine remains strong.

technology.title: Micro-Lumbar Discectomy
technology.content: Using surgical microscopes, we can remove the herniated disc material that is pressing on the nerve root through an incision less than 1 inch long. This preserves the spinal stability and relieves sciatica pain immediately.
technology.imageCaption: Precision Spine Models for Patient Education

process.title: Step 1: Conservative First
process.desc: We always attempt physiotherapy and medication before suggesting surgery.

process.title: Step 2: Micro-Decompression
process.desc: Removing the pressure off the nerve root.

process.title: Step 3: Stabilization
process.desc: If needed, pedicle screws are used to stabilize the vertebrae.

items.doctorExpertise: Living with chronic back pain can be debilitating, often affecting your sleep and mental well-being. Spine surgery is never the first option, but when needed, it is a powerful tool to reclaim your life. We focus on relieving the nerve pressure that causes pain. With 10,000+ successful spine surgeries, our protocol is safe, ethical, and result-oriented.

items.title: Hand Reconstructive Surgery
items.desc: Specialized care for complex hand trauma.
items.intro: The hand is an intricate instrument of function and sensation. Reconstructive surgery here requires the precision of a watchmaker. We handle everything from industrial crush injuries to congenital deformities.

technology.title: Microsurgical Repair
technology.content: We employ microsurgical techniques to repair severed nerves and tendons (flexors and extensors). Early and precise repair is the key to regaining fine motor skills like gripping and writing.

process.title: Step 1: Skeletal Fixation
process.desc: Fixing the fractures using mini-plates and screws.

process.title: Step 2: Soft Tissue Repair
process.desc: Repairing tendons, nerves, and blood vessels.

process.title: Step 3: Functional Rehab
process.desc: Intensive hand therapy to prevent stiffness.

items.doctorExpertise: Our hands are our primary tools for interaction and livelihood. A complex injury can strip away your independence. Reconstructive surgery isn't just about fixing bones; it's about restoring sensation and fine motor skills so you can return to work. My focus is on intricate microsurgical repair to get your function back.
